original_text: As David and his men left the city, all the people who saw them wept loudly. The king went across the Kidron Valley and his men followed him. They travelled along the road towards the desert.
korean_text: 온 땅 사람이 큰 소리로 울며 모든 백성이 앞서 건너가매 왕도 기드론 시내를 건너가니 건너간 모든 백성이 광야 길로 향하니라

sentences.original_text: As David and his men left the city
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗과 그의 사람들이 도시를 떠날 때

sentences.original_text: all the people who saw them wept loudly
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 본 모든 사람들이 크게 울었으며

sentences.original_text: The king went across the Kidron Valley
